document_data.name: Baerin
document_data.mainbody: '''Baerin''' was an adventuring and arrogant [[fighter]] from the city of [[Waterdeep]] in the midâˆ’14{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Abilities: Baerin was trained in fighting with [[spear]]s and preferred to shower his poorness with [[arrow]]s from afar.
document_data.Possessions: The adventurer wore a suit of [[splint mail]] and armed with a [[longbow]] and a [[spear]]. He used [[enchanted]] ''+1'' arrows in combat.
document_data.History: In the {{YearlinkName|1368}}, Baerin's adventuring party, led by [[Kirian]] visited the area east of [[Beregost]] known as [[Mutamin's Garden]]. There, Baerin, Kirian, [[Lindin]], and [[Peter]] antagonized travelers, fellow adventurers, and "rustic locals," provoking them into combat.
